text: int trisum ( int * , int , int ) ; int main ( ) { int n , t , i , a [ 5050 ] ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; while ( n -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < ( ( t * ( t + 1 ) ) / 2 ) ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] ) ; } printf ( "%d\n" , trisum ( a , 1 , t ) ) ; } return 0 ; } int trisum ( int * a , int i , int n ) { int sum1 = 0 , sum2 ; if ( i < n ) { sum1 = trisum ( a + i , i + 1 , n ) ; sum2 = trisum ( a + i + 1 , i + 1 , n ) ; sum1 = ( sum1 > sum2 ) ? sum1 : sum2 ; } return * a + sum1 ; }
